org.hypergraphdb.storage

Interface ByteArrayConverter<T>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    HGPrimitiveType<JavaType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomRefType, BAtoBA, BAtoHandle, BAtoString, BooleanType, ByteType, CalendarType, CharType, DateType, DateTypeBase, DoubleType, EnumType, FloatType, HGHandleType, IntType, LongType, NumericTypeBase, PrimitiveTypeBase, ShortType, StringType, TimestampType

    public interface ByteArrayConverter<T>

    A utility interface to define mappings between byte [] and object instances.
